turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to place an order at the Starbucks on 2nd and Main in Portland, Oregon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'm going to go with the skinny mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's just go with a short cuz I've never had the coconut milk in it. I may not like it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a short skinny mocha with coconut milk, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on second and main.
